commit_scope: Disable default Supabase provider tracking/requirements for automation usage since execution now runs on Railway; keep Supabase support available via explicit opt-in.

commands: cd api && ruff check app/services/automation_usage_service.py tests/test_automation_usage_api.py
git fetch origin main && git rebase origin/main

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting commit/push, PR checks, merge, and deploy verification.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Supabase is no longer tracked or required by default in automation usage/readiness/validation flows; Railway-focused providers remain tracked. Supabase tracking remains available via explicit opt-in settings.
test_flows: Call /api/automation/usage and verify provider list does not include supabase when AUTOMATION_TRACK_SUPABASE is unset.
Call /api/automation/usage/readiness with default required providers and verify supabase is not in required_providers.
Call provider validation with explicit required_providers=openrouter,supabase and verify supabase probe still works (explicit opt-in path).
